article: About ten years ago when I was an undergraduate in college, I was working as an intern at my University s Museum of Natural History. One day while _ at the cash register in the gift shop, I saw a(n) _ couple come in with a little girl in a _ .  As I looked closer at this girl, I _ that she was kind of perched on her chair. I then realized she had no arms or legs, just a _ , neck and torso. She was _ a little white dress with red polka dots.  As the _ wheeled her up to me I was looking down at the register. I turned my head toward the _ and gave her a wink. As I took the money _ her grandparents, I looked back at the girl, who was _ me the loveliest, largest smile I have _ seen. All of a sudden her handicap was _ and all I saw was this beautiful girl, _ smile just melted me and almost instantly gave me a completely _ sense of what life was all about. She took me from a poor, unhappy college _ and brought me into her world; a _ of smiles, love and warmth.  That was ten years ago. I m a successful business person _ and whenever I get down and _ the troubles of the world, I think about that little girl _ the remarkable lessonabout life that she _ me.
